attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Murder is on the up in this country and there is no deterrent. Soft sentences and cushy prison have not and will not prevent more and more people being killed. The latest is the 57 year old killed by a mindless thug in a supermarket. No doubt he'll be out in a few years to kill again. We need harsher sentences. Life means life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
